title: Websites
body:
Websites¶

The websites app enables teams to create one or more public facing websites for their constituents. These websites can expose records from the datasets app, forms from the forms app, event registrations from the events app, and ecommerce from the stores app.

  • Websites: Managing the Access to a Website
  • Websites: Viewing the Details of a Website
  • Domains: Managing a Domain
  • Domains: Adding a New Domain
  • Websites: Creating a New Website
